body.p: Wayne County, West Virginia, farmer. Wayne County, Virginia native. Son of Hiram Bloss and Mary Bloss. Married Sarah A. McClure Bloss in Lawrence County, Kentucky, on April 27, 1854. Father of Hiram Bloss, Mary L. Bloss, and William M. Bloss. Farmer in Wayne County, Virginia, in 1850. Farmer in Wayne County, Virginia, in 1860. Nominated as second lieutenant in Lawrence Countyâ€™s Kentucky National Legion in 1865, but never served.
